import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/ExchangeHistory.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExchangeHistory=()=>{const[exchangesH,setExchanges]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchExchanges=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/exchange-history');setExchanges(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching exchange history:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchExchanges();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exchange-history-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Exchange History"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"exchange-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Item ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Updated At"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:exchangesH.map(exchangeH=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:exchangeH.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:exchangeH.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:exchangeH.item_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(exchangeH.updated_at).toLocaleString()})]},exchangeH.id))})]})]});};export default ExchangeHistory;
